channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortunefield -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortunefield -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-28048|2024-08-07T20:10:05.116Z -- fortunefield -- ffbull
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability exists in ffBull ver.4.11, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command with the privilege of the running web server. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using ffBull ver.4.11.
